> ::Jhiaxus::
> 
> Jhiaxus: We are going to use this clone of Rodimus' wife to draw him
> to this base which is being converted into a giant trap. As for the
> captured Predacon, I'm not sure how they plan on extracting him.
> 
> Hydras:
> 
> "Perceptor is studying the way to interfere with their defences"
>  said dryly Hydras


     Myrmidon nodded as both Jhiaxus and Hydras spoke, his optics dim
and thoughtful. Myrmidon looked up at Hydras, "I would speak with this
perceptor to hear how this will work." He glanced around the room, "Are
your other soldiers here as well, or is this the whole of them?"
     
     Myrmidon turned to regard Jhiaxus, "And Rodimus's wife, where is
the real female located, perhaps she needs to be quieted so your ruse
will not be descovered?"


Preston
(myrmidon)
